missing_email_or_password.title: Missing Email Address or Password
missing_email_or_password.body: You must fill in your email address and choose a password in order to register an account.

compose_email_failed.title: Could not compose email
compose_email_failed.body: The server is misconfigured and cannot send confirmation emails.  This is a serious bug and must be reported immediately.

email_taken.title: Email address already taken
email_taken.body: The email address you're trying to use to register has already been registered.

already_verified.title: This email address has already been verified.
already_verified.body: The email address associated with this token has already been verified.  Please get in touch with your email provider in case of a security breach.

missing_email_or_password.title: Username or password not provided to login form.
missing_email_or_password.body: You tried to log in (or verify your password) but you didn't provide enough information.  Please try again.

bad_user_or_password.title: Unrecognised username or password
bad_user_or_password.body: The username and password combination you provided was not found in the database.  Please make sure you typed your password correctly and try again.

welcome.introduction: Welcome to the online MMORPG, Mojo!
welcome.token_instructions: Please copy/paste the link below into your browser to continue with the registration process.

welcome.title: Welcome to Mojo!
welcome.body: Your account is being prepared.  When it's ready, you will receive an email with a verification link.

success.title: Verifying email address
success.body_post: ) has been successfully verified!  Please type your password below to log in and complete the verification step.
